name: Ape Hero Power
description: Ape Heroes is an NFT project and ecosystem on Binance Smart Chain. We minted out in October 2021 and since then we’ve grown into a multi-collection project with a marketplace, launchpad, and various platform tools to cater to the BSC community. $POW is our ecosystem’s token. $POW’s current utility is buying Whitelist access, entering raffles, taking part in auctions, hatching dinos, and soon minting projects on our launchpad. $POW is minted via our staking feature and is currently tradable on ApeSwap.
